title: SK but it's actually an Escort

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Instead of stabbing your target, you actually just roleblock them.
- If you are attacked, you will roleblock the attacker in addition to your target.
- When you automatically roleblock an attacker, the attack attempt will fail.
- Attackers that target you will have their wills covered in blood, making it unreadable.
- At night, you may choose to spare attackers instead.
